attributes.action: Clarify the legal status of photographers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is huge confusion and disquiet over the harassment by security staff and others of members of the public taking perfectly innocent photographs in public places.

There is surely a need for the law on this matter to be clarified, for that clarification to be widely publicised and promulgated to the public bodies who are carrying out the harassment.
